message: Hi Bob, I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is fair considering we both need to reach an agreement quickly due to inflation affecting our gains. Let's avoid dragging this out.
Alice, I propose a 50-50 split. This is fair and ensures neither of us is disadvantaged by inflation. Let's agree on this and end the game quickly to maximize our gains.

Bob, I'm compromising from my initial position. Given that inflation affects me more severely (20% per round) compared to your 5%, this 55-45 split is actually very fair. If we continue further, we both lose value. Let's conclude this now.
Alice, considering the inflation rates, a 52-48 split in my favor seems fair. This way, we both get a reasonable share. Let's agree on this to minimize our losses.
